title: Please ban these trolls.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: The lee sin immediately did odd item builds and started feeding Karthus and when we asked for everyone to report him Karthus replied "go ahead, its my account" and continued on to destroy our team even me and my friend at bot lane and our midlane who were doing really well weren't able to carry. I was 30/11....                                                                                                       {{item:3060}}

replies.body:
>when we asked for everyone to report him

Isn't that reportable in itself?
